# default

**Type Property**

An instance of the user’s default Shazam library.

## Declaration

```swift
class var `default`: SHMediaLibrary { get }
```

## Adding a matched song to the library

- **add(_:completionHandler:)**: Adds an array of songs to the user’s Shazam library.
